name: Friulia SGR
overview: AlAdInn Ventures makes equity investments mainly in start-ups and fast-growing private companies mainly operating in the geographic area known as Alpe Adria Euroregion, which includes the Italian North-Eastern Regions of Veneto and Friuli Venezia Giulia, the Austrian Southern Region of Carinthia and Slovenia. The Fund will invest in several initiatives in the seed, start-up and expansion phase, operating in life science, clean technology, nanotechnology, information and communication technologies and components sectors. AlAdInn Ventures is managed by a carefully selected management team, with experience in top Italian and international industrial and financial companies, which operates according to the best investment and management practices.
